::DrillBit::

DrillBit ran down to where KitKat had fell.
"Oh, my.." He picked her up, and started taking her back to the base.

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod walked to the mess hall, got some energon and energin, and sat
down. He motioned for Kamodia to join him.
